paper_abstract: Based on both adaptive and sliding mode control techniques, this paper pro poses an integrated approach to fault detection, estimation and fault tolerant control for near space vehicle (NSV) attitude dynamics during re entry phase Firstly, the Takagi and Sugeno (T-S) fuzzy model is employed to approximate complex nonlinear NSV dynamics with actuator faults Then, an adaptive fault diagnostic observer is proposed for detecting and estimating the actuator faults Using the on line obtained fault information, the fault tolerant control scheme based on the sliding mode technique is developed to compensate for the effects of actuator fault by stabilizing the closed loop control system, Finally, simulation results are given to show the effectiveness and potential of the proposed techniques when different actuator fault scenarios are tested
paper_title: FAULT ACCOMMODATION FOR NEAR SPACE VEHICLE ATTITUDE DYNAMICS VIA T-S FUZZY MODELS
